Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Prohibits internet-based food delivery service providers from charging local restaurants and customers a fee for services during the COVID-19 pandemic
Summary: Prohibits internet-based food delivery service providers from charging local restaurants or their customers a fee for services during the COVID-19 pandemic.
LawCode: Add ยง391-v, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to prohibiting internet-based food delivery service providers from charging local restaurants and customers a fee for services during the COVID-19 pandemic; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
